system.availability: A user who is in possession of, or who can reference this book gains +20 to Common Lore (Koronus Expanse), Forbidden Lore (Xenos), and Scholastic Lore (Legend) Tests. If a particularly puritanical Inquisitor discovers the user has this book, they may gain Enemy (Inquisition) Talent.
system.cost: A Tome containing large amounts of forbidden knowledge about the Koronus Expanse and Xenos races within, some dangerously powerful people consider it heretical.
